trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>.

Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
The string describing the functionality of the element.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.

For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
